oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pete and Hannah Shelton family picture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pete and Hannah Shelton with their five children: Artie Malissa, Vicey J., Elizabeth Ibby, Bettie, and James or Brownlow. Pete Shelton's father, the donor's great grandfather, was killed in the Shelton Laurel Massacre. The Shelton Laurel Massacre took place in January 1863 in Madison County, N.C., and involved the execution by a Confederate regiment of thirteen accused Union sympathizers shortly after a raid on salt supplies.
